wrath.client

Class Game.EventManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrath.client.Game.EventManager
  • Enclosing class:
    Game

    public class Game.EventManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to manage all event handlers from the wrath.client.events package.

    • Constructor Summary

      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected EventManager()
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addGameEventHandler(GameEventHandler handler)
      Adds a GameEventHandler to associate with this Game.
      void addInputEventHandler(InputEventHandler handler)
      Adds a InputEventHandler to associate with this Game's Input Manager.
      void addPlayerEventHandler(PlayerEventHandler handler)
      Adds a PlayerEventHandler to associate with the player.
      GameEventHandler getGameEventHandler()
      Gets the root GameEventHandler linked to this Game.
      InputEventHandler getInputEventHandler()
      Gets the root InputEventHandlers linked to this Game's Input Manager.

      Gets the root PlayerEventHandler linked to the player.

    • Method Detail

      • addGameEventHandler

        public void addGameEventHandler(GameEventHandler handler)
        Adds a GameEventHandler to associate with this Game.
        Parameters:
        handler - The GameEventHandler to add to the list of handlers that handles all of this Game's events.

      • addInputEventHandler

        public void addInputEventHandler(InputEventHandler handler)
        Adds a InputEventHandler to associate with this Game's Input Manager.
        Parameters:
        handler - The InputEventHandler to add to the list of handlers that handles all of this Game's Input events.

      • addPlayerEventHandler

        public void addPlayerEventHandler(PlayerEventHandler handler)
        Adds a PlayerEventHandler to associate with the player.
        Parameters:
        handler - The PlayerEventHandler to add to the list of handlers that handles all of the Player's events.

      • getGameEventHandler

        public GameEventHandler getGameEventHandler()
        Gets the root GameEventHandler linked to this Game.
        Returns:
        Returns the root GameEventHandler linked to this Game.

      • getInputEventHandler

        public InputEventHandler getInputEventHandler()
        Gets the root InputEventHandlers linked to this Game's Input Manager.
        Returns:
        Returns the root GameEventHandler linked to this Game's Input Manager.

      • getPlayerEventHandler

        public PlayerEventHandler getPlayerEventHandler()
        Gets the root PlayerEventHandler linked to the player.
        Returns:
        Returns the GameEventHandlers linked to the player.
